page.title: 05SHOPS IN THE ABERDOUR AREA
page.content: In{Aberdour}there are quite a few shops. The biggest is the{CO.OP supermarket where you can buy most of the weeks food. There is also a {butcher}where you can buy{fresh meat and{poultry.}There is a{bakery}which specialises in{cakes.}It also sells {bread.}The{fruit}shop is next to the {bakers}in the{High St.}All kinds of {fruit}can be bought there. If it's {clothes}you're looking for{Aberdour has{4 clothes}shops, mainly for{women and{children.}There are{3 newsagents selling{papers, confectionery}and {cigarettes.}Among the others are{2 {antique}shops,a{postoffice,}a{chemist and{2 hairdressers.}There were also{3 {cafes.}There are{3 unoccupied}shops. There is also a little{craft}shop also selling{jewelery.}It is called{Moray {Craftshop.
